title: Welcome
intro: I'm a seasoned software engineer specializing in C# with hands-on experience in React, Angular, Vue, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. With a career spanning years, I've built robust solutions and versatile applications. I excel in translating intricate concepts into efficient, high-quality code. My front-end proficiency complements my backend skills, creating a holistic full-stack understanding. A strong advocate for best practices, I thrive in collaborative, innovative environments and consistently embrace new technologies to drive excellence in software development.
